snippet: The plan, which would add a track to part of the Main Line, would increase the number of trains serving the system, and would, the governor said, deliver a boost to Long Island’s economy.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo unveils plan to expand Main Line of Long Island Railroad as part of broad transportation agenda but does not specify how project will be funded.

byline.contributor: Arielle Dollinger contributed reporting. Jack Begg contributed research.

lead_paragraph: The plan, which would add a track to part of the Main Line, would increase the number of trains serving the system, and would, the governor said, deliver a boost to Long Island’s economy.

headline.main: Cuomo Revives Long-Stalled Plan to Add Track to L.I.R.R.
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Revives Long-Stalled Plan to Add Track to L.I.R.R.
